name: Pure Vanilla
description:
The unicorns are being attacked by some really cute lions! Protect your kingdom of sweetness and pure vanilla by placing your unicorn soldiers on the battle field!

This was an entry for the GDS Game Jam 2017!

Development team:

  • Khin Baptista (programming and development)
  • Marcelo Vasques (programming and development)
  • Rubens Rodrigues (2d art)
  • Vinicius Meirelles (2d art, programming and development)
